game.name: MAGLAM LORD
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 마왕님은 멸종위기종!? 그런 운명 베어버려! 멸종위기종 마왕 x 결혼 활동 = 마검 창조 액션 RPG!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The demon king is an endangered species!? Oh, slash such fate! A brand new Action-RPG presented by gorgeous creators!

reviewHighlights.text: A cute anime game that plays to it's strengths. The combat is quite shallow but the real star here is the interactions between cast members throughout...
